layout.singingstanza: Deu -- ter -- on -- o -- my thir -- ty: nine -- teen, Deu -- ter -- on -- o -- my thir -- ty: nine -- teen: I call heav -- en and earth To wit -- ness a -- gainst you to -- day: That I have set be -- fore you life and death, Bless -- ing and curse; There -- fore choose life, There -- fore choose life, That you and your seed, You and your seed may live, Choose life that you and your seed may live.

lyrics.stanza: Deuteronomy 30:19, Deuteronomy 30:19: I call heaven and earth To witness against you today: That I have set before you life and death, Blessing and curse; Therefore choose life, Therefore choose life, That you and your seed, You and your seed may live, Choose life that you and your seed may live.
